author: Ult
install_msg: Thank you for installing the DenDenMushi cog! Use `[p]help DenDenMushi` to see available commands. Purupurupuru~
name: DenDenMushi
short: One Piece themed communication system using Den Den Mushi
description: This cog provides a unique, One Piece-inspired communication system using Den Den Mushi. It allows administrators to set up channel-to-channel communications with various Den Den Mushi types, each with unique properties like range and transmission speed.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store end user data. Temporary message data may be stored for transmission purposes but is not retained after use.
